title: Lunch Offer at OWL Cafe & Restaurant, Al Garhoud, Dubai
shortdesc: Join Us for a Night of Fun, Food, and Entertainment!

author.name: Fredrick Flow
author.aboutauthor: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard

longdescription:
delicious meal with salad and soft drink, all for just AED 50 with Shisha AED 65

Call to order: 04 259 4647

Daily Specials:

At OWL, we believe in offering variety and quality. Each day brings a new selection of main dishes to complement your lunch experience. From traditional Arabic delights to Continental favorites, there's something for everyone.

Call to order: 04 259 4647
.

Main Dish + Salad + Soft Drink: Enjoy a delicious meal with a refreshing salad and your choice of soft drink, all for just AED 50.

With Shisha Option: Upgrade your experience to include luxury shisha with your meal for AED 65.

About OWL Cafe & Restaurant:

Since our inception, OWL has been more than just a dining destination. We blend the rich flavors of Arabic and Continental cuisines with top-notch shisha services featuring multiple flavors. Our vibrant entertainment options, including karaoke and live singing shows, ensure every visit is memorable.

Join Us:

Whether you're here for a leisurely lunch, a festive dinner, or an evening of entertainment and shisha, OWL Cafe & Restaurant welcomes you with open arms. Come create lasting memories with us.

Welcome to OWL Cafe & Restaurant, nestled in the heart of Dubai's serene Al Garhoud area. Discover our enticing lunch offer, perfect for a delightful midday break.

Explore our lunch offer today and experience OWL Cafe & Restaurant, your family's home away from home in Dubai.
